response.original_title: 世にも奇妙な物語’24 冬の特別編
response.overview: An omnibus special comprised of four segments:  >> Story 1: "City Lives"  >> Story 2: "Ah, Sokoku yo" (ああ祖国よ)  ~~ Adapted from the story within the novel "Omisore Shakai" (おみそれ社会) by Hoshi Shinichi (星新一 ).  >> Story 3: "Dai 1-kai Tanaka-ke Chichioya Audition" (第1回田中家父親オーディション)  >> Story 4: "Free" (フリー)
response.title: Tales of the Bizarre: 2024 Winter Special
